    • Method Detail

      • turn

        public int turn()
        This method is used to process a turn and determine who won and add cards to the correct deck.
        Parameters:
        gameOverMan - checks whether or not the game is over
        equaled - checks the cards are equal
        greater - checks to see if the player 1 card is higher than player 2's card
        turnWinner - int used to tell who won
